info.title: Billing Management
info.description: This is Swagger UI environment generated for the TMF Billing Management specification

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Comma separated properties to display in response

parameters.name: ratingType
parameters.description: For filtering: Rating type (prepaid, postpaid) of the billing account

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: For filtering: A short descriptive name

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: For filtering: Used to track the lifecycle state

parameters.name: validFor.startDateTime
parameters.description: For filtering: An instant of time, starting at the TimePeriod

parameters.name: validFor.endDateTime
parameters.description: For filtering: An instant of time, ending at the TimePeriod.

parameters.name: customerBillingCycleSpecification.name
parameters.description: For filtering: A short descriptive name

parameters.name: paymentMean.name
parameters.description: For filtering: Name of the payment mean

parameters.name: customerAccount.name
parameters.description: For filtering: Name of the customer account

parameters.name: customerAccount.status
parameters.description: For filtering: The condition of the account, such as due, paid, in arrears, in collection

parameters.name: customerBillFormat.name
parameters.description: For filtering: A short descriptive name

parameters.name: customerBillPresentationMedia.name
parameters.description: For filtering: A short descriptive name

parameters.name: currency.currencyCode
parameters.description: For filtering: A string used as a code for specifying the currency associated to the given amounts. The ISO4217 norm uses 3 letters to define the currency (for example USD for US dollar or EUR for Euro).

parameters.name: billingAccountBalance.type
parameters.description: For filtering: Type of the balance

parameters.name: billingAccountBalance.amount
parameters.description: For filtering: Balance amount

parameters.name: billingAccountBalance.status
parameters.description: For filtering: Balance status

parameters.name: relatedParty.role
parameters.description: For filtering: Role of the related party.

parameters.name: relatedParty.name
parameters.description: For filtering: Name of the related party

parameters.name: billingAccount
parameters.description: The Billing Account to be created

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Identifier of the Billing Account

parameters.description: Identifier of the Billing Account

parameters.name: billingAccount
parameters.description: The Billing Account to be updated

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Comma separated properties to display in response

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: For filtering: Creation date of the applied customer billing charge

parameters.name: currencyCode
parameters.description: For filtering: A string used as a code for specifying the currency associated to the given amounts. The ISO4217 norm uses 3 letters to define the currency (for example USD for US dollar or EUR for Euro).

parameters.name: taxIncludedAmount
parameters.description: For filtering: All taxes included amount to be charged on the customer bill (expressed in the given currency)

parameters.name: taxExcludedAmount
parameters.description: For filtering: Tax excluded amount to be charged on the customer bill (expresses in the given currency).

parameters.name: productSpecification.version
parameters.description: For filtering: Product specification version

parameters.name: productSpecification.lastUpdate
parameters.description: For filtering: Date and time of the last update

parameters.name: productSpecification.name
parameters.description: For filtering: Name of the product specification

parameters.name: productSpecification.isBundle
parameters.description: For filtering: isBundle determines whether a productSpecification represents a single productSpecification (false), or a bundle of productSpecification (true).

parameters.name: productSpecification.brand
parameters.description: For filtering: The manufacturer or trademark of the specification

parameters.name: productSpecification.lifecycleStatus
parameters.description: For filtering: Used to indicate the current lifecycle status

parameters.name: productSpecification.productNumber
parameters.description: For filtering: An identification number assigned to uniquely identity the specification

parameters.name: appliedCustomerBillingTaxRate.amount
parameters.description: For filtering: Tax amount

parameters.name: appliedCustomerBillingTaxRate.taxCategory
parameters.description: For filtering: A categorization of the tax rate

parameters.name: period.startPeriod
parameters.description: For filtering: Start date of the period

parameters.name: period.endPeriod
parameters.description: For filtering: end date of the period

parameters.name: serviceId.type
parameters.description: For filtering: Type of the service identifier (e.g. mobile number)

parameters.name: appliedCustomerBillingCharge
parameters.description: The Applied Customer Billing Charge to be created

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Identifier of the Applied Customer Billing Charge

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Comma separated properties to display in response

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: For filtering: Creation date of the settlement note advice

parameters.name: paymentDueDate
parameters.description: For filtering: Date at which the due amount should have been paid to the partner

parameters.name: taxDate
parameters.description: For filtering: Date of the tax

parameters.name: currencyCode
parameters.description: For filtering: A string used as a code for specifying the currency associated to the given amounts. The ISO4217 norm uses 3 letters to define the currency (for example USD for US dollar or EUR for Euro).

parameters.name: taxExcludedAmount
parameters.description: For filtering: All taxes excluded amount (expressed in the given currency)

parameters.name: taxIncludedAmount
parameters.description: For filtering: All taxes included amount (expressed in the given currency)

parameters.name: settlementMethod.code
parameters.description: For filtering: Code of the settlement method

parameters.name: settlementMethod.label
parameters.description: For filtering: A word, term or phrase by which a settlement method is known and distinguished from other settlement method

parameters.name: settlementNoteImage.imageFormat
parameters.description: For filtering: The format of the settlement note image (csv, pdf, xls, txt...)

parameters.name: settlementNoteImage.imageSize
parameters.description: For filtering: The size of the settlement note image (in bytes)

parameters.name: settlementNoteImage.imageFileName
parameters.description: For filtering: The name of the file in which the settlement note image is saved.

parameters.name: settlementNoteImage.imageFileURL
parameters.description: For filtering: The URL of the settlement note image

parameters.name: taxItem.taxCategory
parameters.description: For filtering: Tax category (for example VAT)

parameters.name: taxItem.taxRate
parameters.description: For filtering: Tax rate

parameters.name: taxItem.taxAmount
parameters.description: For filtering: Tax amount

parameters.name: settlementNoteItem.itemNumber
parameters.description: For filtering: Unique number assigned to the settlement note item

parameters.name: settlementNoteItem.itemId
parameters.description: For filtering: Unique identifier of the settlement note item

parameters.name: settlementNoteItem.itemLabel
parameters.description: For filtering: A free description text for the settlement note item

parameters.name: settlementNoteItem.quantity
parameters.description: For filtering: Quantity

parameters.name: settlementNoteItem.taxExcludedUnitPrice
parameters.description: For filtering: Tax excluded unit price to be applied on the given quantity

parameters.name: settlementNoteItem.taxExcludedAmount
parameters.description: For filtering: Tax excluded amount equal to quantity * taxExcludedUnitPrice

parameters.name: settlementNoteItem.taxIncludedAmount
parameters.description: For filtering: All taxes included amount equal to taxExcludedAmount + taxAmount

post.description: Sets the communication endpoint address the service instance must use to deliver information about its health state, execution state, failures and metrics.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: Data containing the callback endpoint to deliver the information

delete.description: Resets the communication endpoint address the service instance must use to deliver information about its health state, execution state, failures and metrics.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the registered listener

parameters.description: The Billing Account State Change Notification to be published

parameters.description: The Settlement Note Advice Notification to be published

BillingAccount.description: A detailed description of a customer's bill structure

id.description: Unique identifier of the billing account

href.description: Reference of the billing account

ratingType.description: Rating type (prepaid, postpaid) of the billing account

state.description: Used to track the lifecycle state

validFor.description: The period for which the billing account is valid

BillingAccount_Create.description:
A detailed description of a customer's bill structure
Skipped properties: id,href

ratingType.description: Rating type (prepaid, postpaid) of the billing account

state.description: Used to track the lifecycle state

validFor.description: The period for which the billing account is valid

BillingAccount_Update.description:
A detailed description of a customer's bill structure
Skipped properties: id,href,ratingType,billingAccountBalance

state.description: Used to track the lifecycle state

validFor.description: The period for which the billing account is valid

AppliedCustomerBillingCharge.description: An amount, usually of money, for which a person or an organization is financially liable.

id.description: Unique identifier of the applied customer billing charge

href.description: Reference of the applied customer billing charge

date.description: Creation date of the applied customer billing charge

description.description: Additional data to be displayed on the customer bill for this applied customer billing charge

type.description: Type of the applied customer billing charge (recurring, one time or usage) necessary to find the category of the invoice where the charge has to be displayed.

currencyCode.description: A string used as a code for specifying the currency associated to the given amounts. The ISO4217 norm uses 3 letters to define the currency (for example USD for US dollar or EUR for Euro).

taxIncludedAmount.description: All taxes included amount to be charged on the customer bill (expressed in the given currency)

taxExcludedAmount.description: Tax excluded amount to be charged on the customer bill (expresses in the given currency).

AppliedCustomerBillingCharge_Create.description:
An amount, usually of money, for which a person or an organization is financially liable.
Skipped properties: id,href

date.description: Creation date of the applied customer billing charge

description.description: Additional data to be displayed on the customer bill for this applied customer billing charge

type.description: Type of the applied customer billing charge (recurring, one time or usage) necessary to find the category of the invoice where the charge has to be displayed.

currencyCode.description: A string used as a code for specifying the currency associated to the given amounts. The ISO4217 norm uses 3 letters to define the currency (for example USD for US dollar or EUR for Euro).

taxIncludedAmount.description: All taxes included amount to be charged on the customer bill (expressed in the given currency)

taxExcludedAmount.description: Tax excluded amount to be charged on the customer bill (expresses in the given currency).

SettlementNoteAdvice.description: The settlement is about transferring money receiving by a CSP to a partner. The settlement is notified to the partner with a settlement note advice containing details in settlement lines.

id.description: A unique identifier for the settlement note advice

href.description: Reference of the settlement note advice

date.description: Creation date of the settlement note advice

paymentDueDate.description: Date at which the due amount should have been paid to the partner

currencyCode.description: A string used as a code for specifying the currency associated to the given amounts. The ISO4217 norm uses 3 letters to define the currency (for example USD for US dollar or EUR for Euro).

taxExcludedAmount.description: All taxes excluded amount (expressed in the given currency)

taxIncludedAmount.description: All taxes included amount (expressed in the given currency)

CustomerBillPresentationMedia.description: A mean of communicating a customer bill, supported by the associated bill format. For example, post mail, email, web page.

id.description: Unique identifier of the customer bill presentation media

href.description: Reference of the customer bill presentation media

CustomerBillingCycleSpecification.description: A detailed description of when to initiate a billing cycle and the various sub steps of a billing cycle.

id.description: Unique identifier of the customer billing cycle specification

href.description: Reference of the customer billing cycle specification

billingDateShift.description: An offset of a billing date. The offset is expressed as number of days with regard to the start of the billing period.

frequency.description: Frequency of the billing cycle (monthly for instance)

CustomerBillFormat.description: A detailed description of the way in which a customer's bill is presented.

id.description: Unique identifier of the customer bill format

href.description: Reference of the customer bill format

TimePeriod.description: A base / value business entity used to represent a period of time between two timepoints.

startDateTime.description: An instant of time, starting at the TimePeriod

endDateTime.description: An instant of time, ending at the TimePeriod.

CustomerBillingCycleSpecificationRef.description: CustomerBillingCycleSpecification reference. CustomerBillingCycleSpecification  is a detailed description of when to initiate a billing cycle and the various sub steps of a billing cycle.

id.description: Unique identifier of the customer billing cycle specification

href.description: Reference of the customer billing cycle specification

PaymentMeanRef.description: PaymentMean reference. PaymentMean defines a specific mean of payment (e.g direct debit with all details associated).

id.description: Unique identifier of the payment mean

href.description: Reference of the payment mean

CustomerAccountRef.description: CustomerAccount reference. CustomerAccount is used to represent an account for the customer to manage the billing aspects.

id.description: Unique identifier of the customer account

href.description: Unique reference of the customer account

description.description: Detailed description of the customer account

status.description: The condition of the account, such as due, paid, in arrears, in collection

CustomerBillFormatRef.description: Customer bill format reference. Customer bill format is a detailed description of the way in which a customer's bill is presented.

id.description: Unique identifier of the customer bill format

href.description: Reference of the customer bill format

CustomerBillPresentationMediaRef.description: Customer bill presentation media reference. CustomerBillPresentationMedia is a mean of communicating a customer bill, supported by the associated bill format. For example, post mail, email, web page.

id.description: Unique identifier of the customer bill presentation media

href.description: Reference of the customer bill presentation media

Currency.description: A base / Value business entity used to represent currency

currencyCode.description: A string used as a code for specifying the currency associated to the given amounts. The ISO4217 norm uses 3 letters to define the currency (for example USD for US dollar or EUR for Euro).

BillingAccountBalance.description: A detailed description of a customer's bill structure

RelatedPartyRef.description: RelatedParty reference. RelatedParty defines party or party role linked to a specific entity.

id.description: Unique identifier of a related party

href.description: Reference of the related party, could be a party reference or a partyRole reference

validFor.description: Validity period of the related party

ProductSpecification.description: Is a detailed description of a tangible or intangible object made available externally in the form of a ProductOffering to customers or other parties playing a party role.

id.description: Unique identifier of the product specification

href.description: Reference of the product specification

lastUpdate.description: Date and time of the last update

description.description: A narrative that explains in detail what the product specification is

isBundle.description: isBundle determines whether a productSpecification represents a single productSpecification (false), or a bundle of productSpecification (true).

brand.description: The manufacturer or trademark of the specification

lifecycleStatus.description: Used to indicate the current lifecycle status

validFor.description: The period for which the product specification is valid

productNumber.description: An identification number assigned to uniquely identity the specification

AppliedCustomerBillingTaxRate.description: An amount of money levied on the price of a product by a legislative body.

taxCategory.description: A categorization of the tax rate

Period.description: Defines the period of a recurring charge

ServiceId.description: Defines the identifier of the service.

id.description: Identifier of the service

type.description: Type of the service identifier (e.g. mobile number)

ProductSpecCharacteristic.description: A characteristic quality or distinctive feature of a ProductSpecification.  The characteristic can be take on a discrete value, such as color, can take on a range of values, (for example, sensitivity of 100-240 mV), or can be derived from a formula (for example, usage time (hrs) = 30 - talk time *3). Certain characteristics, such as color, may be configured during the ordering or some other process.

description.description: A narrative that explains in detail what the productSpecCharacteristic is

valueType.description: A kind of value that the characteristic can take on, such as numeric, text and so forth

configurable.description: If true, the Boolean indicates that the productSpecCharacteristic is configurable

validFor.description: The period for which the productSpecCharacteristic is valid

ServiceSpecificationRef.description: Service specification reference: ServiceSpecification(s) required to realize a ProductSpecification.

id.description: Unique identifier of the service specification

href.description: Reference of the serviceSpecification

ProductSpecificationRelationship.description: A migration, substitution, dependency or exclusivity relationship between/among product specifications.

id.description: Unique identifier of the productSpecification

href.description: Reference of the productSpecification

type.description: Type of relationship such as migration, substitution, dependency, exclusivity

validFor.description: The period for which the productSpecificationRelationship is valid

ResourceSpecificationRef.description: Resource Specification reference: The ResourceSpecification is required to realize a ProductSpecification.

id.description: Unique identifier of the resource specification

href.description: Reference of the resource specification

Attachment.description: Describes a product through video, pictures...

href.description: Reference of the attachment

id.description: Unique identifier of the attachment

type.description: Attachment type such as video, picture

url.description: Uniform Resource Locator, is a web page address (a subset of URI)

BundledProductSpecification.description: A type of ProductSpecification that belongs to a grouping of ProductSpecifications made available to the market. It inherits of all attributes of ProductSpecification.

id.description: Unique identifier of the product specification

href.description: Reference of the product specification

lifecycleStatus.description: Used to indicate the current lifecycle status

ProductSpecCharRelationship.description: An aggregation, migration, substitution, dependency or exclusivity relationship between/among productSpecCharacteristics.

type.description: Type of relationship such as aggregation, migration, substitution, dependency, exclusivity

validFor.description: The period for which the productSpecCharRelationship is valid

ProductSpecCharacteristicValue.description: A number or text that can be assigned to a ProductSpecCharacteristic.

valueType.description: A kind of value that the characteristic can take on, such as numeric, text, and so forth

default.description: Indicates if the value is the default value for a characteristic

value.description: A discrete value that the characteristic can take on

valueFrom.description: The low range value that a characteristic can take on

valueTo.description: The upper range value that a characteristic can take on

validFor.description: The period of time for which a value is applicable

SettlementMethod.description: Is the way in which the CSP provides the payment

label.description: A word, term or phrase by which a settlement method is known and distinguished from other settlement method

SettlementNoteImage.description: Is the image of the settlement note

imageFormat.description: The format of the settlement note image (csv, pdf, xls, txt...)

imageSize.description: The size of the settlement note image (in bytes)

imageFileName.description: The name of the file in which the settlement note image is saved.

imageFileURL.description: The URL of the settlement note image

ReceiverRef.description: Receiver reference. The receiver is the party role who will receive the settlement note.

id.description: Identifier of the receiver

href.description: Reference of the receiver

TaxItem.description: A tax item is created for each tax rate and tax type used in the settlement note.

IssuerRef.description: Issuer reference. The issuer is the party role who will issue the settlement note.

id.description: Identifier of the issuer

href.description: Reference of the issuer

SettlementNoteItem.description: Concerns a product identified by its catalogue reference. It could also follow a period delimited by a start and an end date.

itemNumber.description: Unique number assigned to the settlement note item

itemId.description: Unique identifier of the settlement note item

itemLabel.description: A free description text for the settlement note item

taxExcludedUnitPrice.description: Tax excluded unit price to be applied on the given quantity

taxExcludedAmount.description: Tax excluded amount equal to quantity * taxExcludedUnitPrice

taxIncludedAmount.description: All taxes included amount equal to taxExcludedAmount + taxAmount

TaxRegistration.description: The CSP and the partner could be registered with a tax number in a tax registration system.

BillingAccountStateChangeNotification.description: BillingAccountStateChange notification is sent to each listener who has subscribed to receive it.

resourcePath.description: To indicate which entity is concerned

fieldPath.description: details which field is missing, its structure is quite similar to GET filter criteria

SettlementNoteAdviceNotification.description: The SettlementNoteAdvice notification is sent to each listener who has subscribed to receive it.

resourcePath.description: To indicate which entity is concerned

fieldPath.description: details which field is missing, its structure is quite similar to GET filter criteria

BillingAccountEvent.description: The billingAccount event is generated each time the billing account state is updated.

SettlementNoteAdviceEvent.description: The SettlementNoteAdvice event is generated each time a settlement note is created.

id.description: Id of the listener

code.description: An integer coding the error type. This is given to caller so he can translate them if required.

message.description: A short localized string that describes the error.

description.description: (optional) A long localized error description if needed. It can contain precise information about which parameter is missing, or what are the identifier acceptable values.

infoURL.description: (optional) A URL to online documentation that provides more information about the error.
